lead_paragraph: MONTREAL, Nov. 3 (Canadian Press) -- Great Lakes vessels that prove suitable will be diverted to the Eastern United States coast during the Winter, F.T. Cuttle, new technical adviser on inland navigation problems to the Canadian Navigation Board, said in an interview today.
abstract: U S Navy yards to build 50 secret-design convoy escort ships for Brit; Canadian Great Lakes ships to replace U S ships transferred ao Brit from Southern coast and Gulf of Mex
